entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of freezing rain mixed with snow. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain and flurries and ice pellets ending before morning then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 11:17 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to zero in the morning then rising. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to zero in the morning then rising. Forecast issued 11:17 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the evening. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the evening then becoming light after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:17 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
